rowObjects.data:
{
	"userId": {{ appsmith.store.jwt }},
	"rowIndex": {{ get_policies_assets.data[0]?.rowIndex }},

	"lifePoliciesComments": {{ Input_LifePolicy_Comms.value }},
	"retirementPoliciesCurrentValue": {{ Input_RetirementPolicy_CurrVal.value }},
	"retirementPoliciesDeathPayoutValue": {{ Input_RetirementPolicy_DeathVa.value }},
	"retirementPoliciesComments": {{ Input_RetirementPolicy_Comms.value }},
	"otherPoliciesCurrentValue": {{ Input_OtherPolicy_CurrVal.value }},
	"otherPoliciesDeathPayoutValue": {{ Input_OtherPolicy_DeathPayVal.value }},
	"otherPoliciesComments": {{ Input_OtherPolicy_Comms.value }}
	}
